api.email_change_mail_text: You have requested an email change. Please verify your new email address by clicking the link below. If you did not request this change you can ignore this email.
api.verify_email_sent: Verification link sent to your email. Link is valid for 30 minutes.
api.email_sending_failed: Email sending failed. This could be caused by invalid email address or server error.
api.invalid_display_name: Invalid display name. Display name must be 3-30 characters long.
api.invalid_given_name: Invalid first name. First name must be 2-35 characters long.
api.invalid_surname: Invalid last name. Last name must be 2-35 characters long..
api.profile_updated: Profile updated. Some changes require you to re-login to take effect.

mail_list.loop: LOOP: Events, partner announcements, and academic matters related to Luuppi
mail_list.freeloop: FREELOOP: A free list for buying, selling, advertising, exchanging, and sharing information within the limits of Finnish law and good taste.
mail_list.alumni: Alumni: A list for individuals who have previously been involved with Luuppi
mail_list.new_students: First-year: Specifically for first-year students interested in Luuppi's events and other information

auth.accept_terms: I accept the terms and conditions

hero.description: Luuppi ry is a subject association for students of computer science, mathematics and data analysis at Tampere university. We organize events, tutoring and other activities for our members. We are one of the biggest subject associations at Tampere university and we have over 500 members.

partners.title: Partners
partners.description: We are proud to work with these companies. If you are interested in collaboration don't hesitate to contact us!

pages_404.title: Page not found
pages_404.description: Ooops.... The page you are looking for does not exist. Please check the URL and try again.

seo.title: Luuppi ry | Subject association for mathematics, statistical data analysis, and computer science students at the University of Tampere
seo.description: Luuppi ry is the subject association for mathematics, statistical data analysis, and computer science students at the University of Tampere. Luuppi has actively represented the interests of its members and organized recreational activities since 1969. With its membership, Luuppi is the largest subject association at the University of Tampere!

footer.description: Luuppi ry is the student organization for computer science, mathematics, and statistical data analysis at the University of Tampere.
